text:
"Raindrops (Encore une fois)" is a 2008 song by the German DJ group Sash! and it features English dance music act Stunt.. It is the first single from Sash's seventh studio album "The Best Of" which was released on 20 October 2008.
Mashup.
"Raindrops (Encore une fois)" is a mashup of Sash!'s song "Encore une fois" and Stunt's single "Raindrops".
